# Tender Invitation 
## Request for Proposal (RFP) - Announce 200827 

### Tender Details
* **Tender Reference**: cb-9098-55368782
* **Announcement Number**: ISED208227
* **Publication Date**: 2023-09-14
* **Closing Date**: 2023-10-03T14:00:00
* **Modification Number**: 4

### Tender Description
We are seeking a supplier to provide an **External Preamplifier** that operates at a frequency range of **1 GHz to 85 GHz** as part of a procurement agreement.

### Contract Details
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-10-18
* **Contract Duration**: From 2023-10-18 to 2024-03-31
* **Submission Method**: RFP against Supply Arrangement. Please submit a proposal through the [GC Bid Contract platform](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders/Search). Ensure you comply with the evaluation criteria outlined in Annex B.

### Evaluation Criteria 
To be evaluated based on **lowest price**. Suppliers must reply to the request by closing date to be considered a participating bidder.

### End User Entity 

As per government guidelines, we are required to share information with specific end-users. Therefore, please note that this contract is not open for public bids, nor funding organizations.

### Contacts 
* Contact Name: Katelyn McAdam
* Contact Email: [Katelyn.Mcadam@ISDE.isdi.gov.ca](mailto:Katelyn.Mcadam@ISDE.isdi.gov.ca)
* Contact Phone Number: (343) 548-2485

# Attachements

- [Attachment B: Tender Notice - English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9098/annex-b---npp20230921-english.pdf)
- [Attachment B: Tender Notice - French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9098/annex-b---npp20230921-french.pdf)

# Procurement Documents 
Additional procurement documentation can be found on the [Materials > Canada Buy  website]. Only active government workers/ Economically efficient ministries persons can have access to these documents. Please consult your workplace lead.
